Item ID1159

The mithril full helm is the fourth best full helmet. It requires 20 Defence to equip. It offers better defensive stats than its med helm counterpart, at the cost of having lower magic and ranged attack, and greater weight. One can be made by a player with level 57 Smithing at any anvil with a hammer and 2 mithril bars.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-6-3
 Defence bonuses
+13+14+11-1+13
 Other bonusesSlot

[[File:Mithril full helm detail.png|left|70px]]
[[File:Mithril full helm chathead.png|left]]
The '''mithril full helm''' is the fourth best [[full helmet]]. It requires 20 [[Defence]] to equip. It offers better defensive stats than its [[mithril med helm|med helm]] counterpart, at the cost of having lower magic and ranged attack, and greater weight. One can be made by a player with level 57 [[Smithing]] at any anvil with a [[hammer]] and 2 [[mithril bar]]s.
